name: reversionary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the return of something to its previous owner: The council agreed to waive its reversionary rights to the land. A number of reversionary leases exist with reference to the properties in this area.
More examplesFewer examplesShe has a reversionary interest in the apartment that she owned with her ex-husband.The county agreed to release its reversionary interest in the land and grant mining rights subject to certain conditions.The date on which the reversionary tenancy is to end must be provided.
